definition: to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
to grow/to plant/to insert/to force on sb/to fall head first

sentences.english: The rate of survival after habituation was over 90%.
sentences.chinese: 组培苗驯化移栽成活率达90%以上。

sentences.english: It will be an ideal rice transplanting machine at present.
sentences.chinese: 水稻钵苗行栽机是目前较为理想的一种水稻移栽机械。

sentences.english: The survival rate of planets after transplanting to soil reached as high as 95%.
sentences.chinese: 再生苗生根后移栽的成活率可达95%以上。

sentences.english: He transplanted the seedlings into peaty soil.
sentences.chinese: 他把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里。

sentences.english: Normally, transplanted trees are not flourishing if the seedlings be transplanted incorrectly.
sentences.chinese: 一般说来，茶苗移栽的技术掌握不当。

sentences.english: The survival rate of rooted plantlets in the field was 57%.
sentences.chinese: 生根苗大田移栽成活率达到57%。

sentences.english: The temperature was found to be critical for successfully transplanting plantlets from culture vessel into pot.
sentences.chinese: 温度是提高小苗移栽成活率的关键因素。

sentences.english: When transferred to peat, gardening soil or vermiculite, the shoots can propagate themselves.
sentences.chinese: 组培材料移栽到草炭土，蛭石和园土后，均可繁殖。

sentences.english: Growth and development traits of hybrid Pennistum were studied at the ecological condition of Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 研究了杭州生态条件下移栽杂交狼尾草的生育特性。

sentences.english: In the groundmass transplantation way, the survival rate was higher.
sentences.chinese: 采用基质移栽，成活率较高。

sentences.english: Transplant the plant not too deep in substrate. Avoid root damage.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免损害根部，移栽时底部不要埋得过深。

sentences.english: Higher or lower air humidity is prone to make transplanted plants wither.
sentences.chinese: 空气湿度过高或过低都容易使移栽苗萎蔫。

sentences.english: We'll transplant the flowers to the garden.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把这些花儿移栽到花园里。

sentences.english: Transplanting of young plants was critical to the whole experiment.
sentences.chinese: 小苗移栽是实验的又一关键环节。

sentences.english: The combined guiding seedling mechanism with vibration make seedlings drop to the transplanting furrow without been jammed in the guiding cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 采用组合振动导苗筒式移栽机构解决导苗管堵苗问题。

sentences.english: Seedling perpendicularity is one of the most important targets of evaluating transplant machine performance.
sentences.chinese: 秧苗直立度是评价移栽机性能重要指标之一。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
